title: Longhorns Daily News : Bijan Robinson on Texa loss to OU :  I was hurt . It was a bad day for me .
body_text:
Bijan Robinson ended his Texas Longhorns career with a big win last year over the Oklahoma Sooners in the programs’ annual Red River Rivalry. But that doesn’t it mean it didn’t hurt the Texas alum last weekend as he watched Oklahoma narrowly beat Texas.
Longhorns Daily News: Bijan Robinson on Texas’ loss to OU: ‘I was hurt. It was a bad day for me.’
Plus: Texas volleyball takes on Houston this weekend
“It was definitely a tough one because I know we made some mistakes that, if we didn’t make them, we would’ve won the game. But that last drive, they went down the field, scored. I was hurt. It was a bad day for me,” Robinson said, according to Inside Texas.
Robinson wasn’t alone.
